New Records: Glenn Maxwell equalled the record for the most T20I hundreds with a dazzling 120 not out from 55 balls against West Indies.
Australia set their highest T20I score on home soil of 241 for 4.
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell scored 120 not out from 55 balls, including eight sixes and 12 fours.
Maxwell's innings helped Australia secure a win and series victory over West Indies.
Post-Match Reflections: Glenn Maxwell expressed his comfort and confidence in his current form and batting approach.
Maxwell reflected on his innings, mentioning his initial frustration and how he calmed down to build a strong platform.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxwell's score of 120 was the second-highest by a batter coming in at No.4 or below in T20Is.
Four of Maxwell's five T20I centuries have come at No.4, a position he enjoys batting in.
